Plot: April Carver, whose world has just started to look up, is diagnosed with leukemia. With the support of her family and best friend, she might just be able to fight it.
Title: Chasing Life
Writer: Susanna Fogel, Marco Lagarde, Joni Lefkowitz, Patricio Saiz, Ricardo Álvarez Canales
Actors: Italia Ricci, Mary Page Keller, Richard Brancatisano, Haley Ramm
